actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide financial relief to livestock producers by extending until December 31, 1975, the date for compliance with permits issued with respect to the national pollution discharge elimination system.

summary.text: Extends the date for compliance by livestock producers with permits issued with respect to the national pollutant discharge elimination system under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act from December 31, 1974 to December 31, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial relief to livestock producers by extending until December 31, 1975, the date for compliance with permits issued with respect to the national pollution discharge elimination system.
